entry.title: With Great Fire
entry.summary:
Author: Taylorm1509

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,441Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Evan Buckley didn‚Äôt break bones the way other kids did. He learned that in eighth grade, when he fell off the roof of the gym during a dumb dare from Flash Thompson. Landed on the concrete. Hard. Everyone thought he‚Äôd shattered something. He got up. Winded. Bruised. No break. Not even a sprain. The nurse said he was lucky. Buck knew better.He didn‚Äôt feel lucky. He felt wrong. Like there was a blueprint for how a person was supposed to work, and he‚Äôd been printed just slightly off-axis. Because it wasn‚Äôt the first time.ORAn AU where Buck is the Spider-Man of this universe. Getting his powers as his parents were desperate to heal Daniel, they sought help beyond conventional medicine. An experimental treatment that might jumpstart Daniel‚Äôs immune system through enhanced gene therapy using a matched donor‚Äôs stem cells. Create a sibling. A perfect donor child, whose DNA could be pre-modified to produce regenerative stem cells and enhanced immunity. Buck was this perfect donor child.Buck has to learn how to juggle his responsibilities as Spider-Man whilst still being a firefighter at the 118. People start to catch on.

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue

Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,828Chapters: 14/23Kudos: 310

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth‚Ä¶ then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it‚Äôs his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3¬†Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. entry.title: camping with... buddie and tarlos
entry.summary:
Author: softlightstills

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,596Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 3

Summary: Now, Buck really wasn't an early riser and he could sleep through so much, it surprised him sometimes that he didn't just sleep through the whole day. This day though, it seemed that he woke up to something that he hadn't ever woken up to before and he wasn't quite sure yet what he thinks of it.At first he thought it was chirping of the birds, but he was quickly reminded that he would have heard that too if he left his window opened a bit at night. This wasn't new. Then he thought it might have been the branch that tapped the tent, in a very annoying pattern. But it was too soft to have pushed him out of the quite deep sleep he had been in. But as he moved slightly, getting ready to look up to try and find what else it could have been, he noticed.He noticed how there was something hard pressed to his ass while a hot breath softly puffed to his back.Or: Four men go camping together and share two tents, only for Buck to wake up in his sleeping bag to find something hard pressed up against his ass. His tent mate's erection.

They‚Äôre boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they‚Äôre dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface.¬†AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: Never Let Me Go ( A Sinner Like Me)
entry.summary:
Author: colescharms

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 184,091Chapters: 45/?Kudos: 318

Summary: When infamous rockstar Evan ‚ÄúBuck‚Äù Buckley gets injured (again), his label hires Army vet-turned-EMT Eddie Diaz to shadow him on tour. Eddie‚Äôs job is simple: keep Buck breathing. But nothing about Buck is simple‚Äînot his smile, not his secrets, and definitely not the way he starts to feel like home.Eddie‚Äôs supposed to keep Buck safe. Buck‚Äôs supposed to stay out of trouble. But somewhere between motel parking lots, midnight emergency calls, and songs that sound too much like confessions, lines blur‚Äîand hearts get caught in the wreckage.This tour might save Buck‚Äôs career. It might ruin Eddie‚Äôs life. Or maybe, if they‚Äôre lucky, it could be the start of something louder than either of them expected.

entry.title: Last Words
entry.summary:
Author: henkomar

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,719Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 71

Summary: Buck knew without a doubt that if any one of his friends or family could be in his mind for even a second they‚Äôd go mad. The constant screaming, the repeated phrases of his greatest hits‚Äîthey‚Äôd never survive it. He doesn‚Äôt even know if he can survive it.When he got like this in the past, it was always easily cured with a quick text to Bobby or plopping onto the Diaz couch with a beer and a sigh. Except neither of those things were possible anymore.Bobby was goneChris was goneEddie was goneBobby is gone.Everyone left, everyone had someone, but Buck‚Äôs someone is gone and even when he was here, Buck was terrified of being too much, doing too much, until even Bobby gave up on him. It had happened before and not just with Bobby.(Or: Buck is struggling more than anyone knows, and the 8x17 fight and Buck‚Äôs need to take back control over his life manifests physically)

entry.title: Chimney Han: Professional Cockblock
entry.summary:
Author: caffeinatedplant

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,824Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 47

Summary: That is way more of Evan Buckley than he ever wanted to see. He turns around fast enough to get whiplash.‚ÄúBuck, Tommy, we are so sorry. Don‚Äôt worry we‚Äôre leaving now.‚Äù Maddie says.‚ÄúIn our defense we did knock three times.‚Äù Chim adds. His mind then replays what Maddie just said.WaitBuck. Tommy.Tommy‚ÄúI thought you said Tommy was working all weekend?‚Äù Chimney questions.‚ÄúFuck!‚Äù A voice hisses.That- that doesn‚Äôt sound like Buck or Tommy. That sounds like----Chimney and Maddie accidentally learn Buck and Eddie are dating. The problem is Buck can‚Äôt break up with Tommy for another five weeks. As revenge for being forced to keep a secret, Chimney vows to stop Buck and Eddie from having sex.---Five times Chimney keeps Buck and Eddie‚Äôs relationship a secret plus one time he doesn‚Äôt.
